title: Heart-to-Heart (Aoi), Calligraphic Excerpt from Chapter 9 of the "Tale of Genji" (Genji monogatari)
description:
Transliteration:  Kage wo nomi / mitarashigawa no / tsurenaki ni / mi no uki hodo zo / itodo shiraruru.
Translation:  One fugitive glimpse as of a face reflected in a hallowed stream tells me with new cruelty that I matter not at all!
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Bequest of the Hofer Collection of the Arts of Asia
medium: The ninth of a series of 54 kotobagaki (calligraphic album leaves) mounted in an album with illustrations; ink and color on paper

images.publiccaption: Chapter 9: A is painting on left, B is calligraphy on right
images.copyright: President and Fellows of Harvard College
